title: Meta Will Slow Hiring, Won't Rule Out Future Layoffs
description: Facebook-parent CEO Mark Zuckerberg says in a town hall meeting that employee growth of 1%-2% a year will be the standard in future.

title: Twitter Begins Removing Legacy Check Marks
description: Celebrities appeared to lose their blue check marks as the social-media platform moves in favor of paid subscriptions.

title: Alphabet's Google Combines AI Research Units Brain and DeepMind
description: Search giant merges AI resources to accelerate progress in technology that is reshaping business.

title: When Apple Comes Calling, 'It's the Kiss of Death'
description: Aspiring partners accuse tech giant of copying their ideas; Apple says it plays by the rules
